data.title: Filming in Thurrock
data.meta_description: Thurrock Council is a unitary authority in the east of England.
data.text:
Thurrock has been used as a film location many decades – The Guns of Loos was filmed at the West Thurrock chalk pits as far back as 1928.

Below are some of the films and television programmes shot on location in Thurrock since the 1950s.

Films

Year Film Location 2020 His House Various locations in Tilbury 2018 Peterloo Tilbury Fort 2017 Tulip Fever Tilbury Fort 2017 Darkest Hour Tilbury Fort 2017 Wonder Woman Tilbury Fort 2016 Grimsby Multiple sites in Tilbury 2016 Rise of the Footsoldiers 3 Argent Street car park, Grays 2015 Mr Holmes Cruise Terminal, Tilbury 2014 Paddington Cruise Terminal and Docks, Tilbury 2010 Harry Potter and The Deathly Hallows Dartford Tunnel 2009 Fish Tank Tilbury Town station and other locations around Tilbury 2005 Batman Begins Coalhouse Fort 2004 Alfie Tilbury Docks 2002 28 Days Later Broadview Transport Café, Stanford 2000 Essex Boys East Tilbury Marshes, Bata Building, Tilbury and under QEII Bridge, West Thurrock 1993 Four Weddings and a Funeral St. Clements Church, West Thurrock and Old Gas Showrooms, Grays 1992 Blue Ice Tilbury Docks 1990 Chicago Joe and the Show Girl State Cinema, Grays 1989 Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade Tilbury Docks 1988 Who Framed Roger Rabbit? State Cinema, Grays 1975 Brannigan Tilbury Docks 1963 The Victors Tilbury area 1958 Up the Creek Ward's ship-breaking yard, Grays 1950 Hangman's Wharf East Tilbury Rectory, Sydney Road, Tilbury and Gibbs Wharf, Grays 1937 Glamorous Night Tilbury Landing Stage 1935 The Stoker Tilbury Docks 1935 Me and Marlborough Goldsmith's Wharf, Grays 1929 The Berg (later called 'Atlantic') Tilbury Docks 1927 The Guns of Loos Gibbs's Pit, West Thurrock Pre-1914 Unnamed British-made 'Western' films Purfleet-on-Thames, around Botany Gardens, the chalk cliff area and the Royal Hotel

Actors who performed on location for some of these films have included:

Christian Bale

Sean Bean

Sacha Baron Cohen

Michael Fassbender

Gal Gadot

Hugh Grant

Tom Hardy

Bob Hoskins

Cillian Murphy

Gary Oldman

Rebel Wilson
